description:
Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the arena… Land the Captain and Shark Double Pack today to receive new outfits, weapon skins, titles, banners and emotes to use on the battlefield in salty style!

This pack includes:
• Captain outfit (3 colour variants)
• Shark outfit (3 colour variants)
• 2 Emotes: Land Ahoy and Swimming
• 2 Weapon Skins: Treasure Map and Shark Infested
• 2 Banners: Ship and Shark
• 2 Titles: “Salty Seadog” and “Shark Bait”
name: Worms Rumble - Captain & Shark Double Pack
